commits.msg:
puppet-watcher: Initial commit

This is the initial commit for puppet-watcher.
It has been automatically generated using cookiecutter[1] and msync[2]

[1] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-openstack-cookiecutter
[2] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-modulesync-configs

Change-Id: I72a2df77b202c994b24887062544918903f3631b

This commit adds the initial project files.

Unit tests: added

Packages for Debian and RedHat family OS are not known. Until that
package installation has been removed from init.pp file.

Change-Id: I79f41e1168d26ee7ed4785ef46783a24a246f21b

Implement api.pp

Unit tests fixed.

Change-Id: I422a1f591f9d09b3db3fbb6f85fc38e6ef6eef17

Added watcher package ensure

Watcher package is available now for RedHat and Debian (experimental
repo).

Note: Watcher package is not available in Ubuntu repository.

Change-Id: Id805f0d3494a858ef43cb2ba396824592847d689

Include openstacklib defaults manifest.

This provides a mechanism for setting default across all modules.

Change-Id: I28014d264d5c422fa90bb182697f63894e255e88
Related-Bug: 1599113
Depends-On: I31f3b254b3c36fb30cf968195ee3e0520490a04f

Fix authtoken options and adding the missing

This change updates the api class to pass the keystone_authtoken options
to the keystone::resource::authtoken now that those options are properly
supported.
Watcher configuration sample file doesn't include all of
keystonemiddleware parameters, but the parameters can be configured in
watcher config file.[1]

[1] - http://docs.openstack.org/developer/watcher/deploy/conf-files.html

Co-Authored-By: Daniel Pawlik <daniel.pawlik@corp.ovh.com>

Change-Id: I31f3b254b3c36fb30cf968195ee3e0520490a04f

Implement watcher-db-manage commands

Added DB commands: upgrade and create_schema.
Removed sync command.


Change-Id: I1c4e2c36ba675cfbbbde3b038067f73c98c150ff

Implement applier and decision-engine

Change-Id: I00854d1281c083df36997e2c907e3a7bd353551d

Changed api service requirements

Watcher-api doesn't need watcher::db class in service requirements,
because it is handled by deps class.

Change-Id: I61168aa307c3e751d78c979104e38e2cf72e48d2

Added planer sections

Planner sections are only used by decision engine service.

Change-Id: Ia92d612cb51a4914913dc853f7ea7f6f76d524f5

Change authtoken to class

Authtoken will be configure by a new class
instead of api class.

Change-Id: I95c8875a213057f687017779cb236ececbe6ebc1

Fix puppet-lint before upgrading gem

Removing puppet-lint warnings
in favor of upgrading to latest gem

2016-09-13 21:13:01.029817 | manifests/api.pp:221:WARNING: line has more than 140 characters

Change-Id: Iff0f9ac6d6de528b8ea2ff01f1bbbf164bde8bfc

Fix documentation for log_dir parameter

Change-Id: I78b06943b0b1d6d6c40fa0ac4b8d45b19de5a6a5
Partial-Bug: #1600294

Added ability to configure workers for watcher api

By default it will use the ::os_workers fact. ::os_workers
is based on the number of processors (currently cpu/4) but is
capped at a maximum of 8 worker processors.

Change-Id: I415794daa6305d675b9341165a3722d2c0760560

Add purge_config option

Add the option in order to facilitate management.
User can ensure that only the options they hoped
are configured.

Change-Id: I6d6b5d89a3ed3e631fd02223fbf581e6a978b12a

Add support for db_max_retries param

The db_max_retries parameter regulates the number of reconnection
attempts performed after an error raised rather than at startup.

Change-Id: Ib4a04482f7b67b4b38a91031ba9a25670e52d91b
Closes-Bug: 1579718

Added new parameters only for watcher sections.

Change-Id: I74b4a184909c35881eaac021e2bc82efdaf2e2f1

Remove rabbitmq connection parameters

The rabbitmq connection parameters have been removed in favor of the
transport_url setting.

Change-Id: Ib13ee35c8195677a81c157a171c759afbf65d344
Related-Bug: #1625198

Fix hooks for external install & svc management

1) Add deps to all that is needed.
2) Fix hooks for external install & svc management.
3) Update releated spec tests.

Change-Id: Id3e0594631579c316c721dd53b0579808571ee95

Add deps to authtoken

The authtoken class needs to include the ::watcher::deps class.

Change-Id: I99b5e270ccf1a7432e864201b4f5803387eb3a12

Remove signing_dir option

The signing_dir is deprecated for removel because PKI token format
is no longer supported.

Change-Id: I91a99b581e5cd09c532d6d5e52e630e086340837
Closes-Bug: #1652700

Allow python-memcache install from authtoken class

The python-memcache package is required if using memcached. By
default the package is not installed and the define has it set to
false. This change allows managing the python-memcache package
install from the authtoken class.

Change-Id: Ifd3fdea4c08fa9df451bcd4dc01f70b9a53f72c8

Fix typo in api.pp

TrivialFix

Change-Id: I0bbd5992381b3c184f9a757bbf1759444a1d6733

Add oslo::db to dependency chain

All db settings should be applied and all releated packages should be
installed before dbsync starts.

Change-Id: If592611b0b226b8f89d6d97469f63e83ecbf3e86

Inconsistent package_ensure parameter name

The parameter name used to enforce package state is inconsistent across
manifests and modules. I settle on package_ensure since it's already
widely used.

Change-Id: I843bdc0b9f72b4758c19e6a8ddad1368c7d80977
Closes-Bug: #1668732

Add the setting log level

Increase the setting log level in the synchronization database.

Change-Id: I98bbc3d0a5cf8f57448a210399c3caede6b4292f
Closes-Bug: #1683567

Fix upgrade command

Make our upgrade class match devstack.
https://github.com/openstack/watcher/blob/2d98d5e743d8a1ed1bcb9ca4ff79774491b4ee96/devstack/lib/watcher#L238

Change-Id: I02ce5e52f78282c394b086b8643655dbe226bd68

Deprecate rabbit_max_retries option

Option "rabbit_max_retries" from group "oslo_messaging_rabbit" is
deprecated for removal. Its value may be silently ignored in the future.

Change-Id: I0a98136f6fb4579cbf4d609b3ee495da208a41eb
Closes-Bug: #1697350

Revert "Fix upgrade command"

They changed their mind and are back to an upgrade
without 'head' as per https://review.openstack.org/#/c/485495/

This reverts commit 3653345f1cb1a3663dfb28473caa80643027be5c.

Change-Id: I2b33771899659bb7b32fce02eaa0ddcfb6656ad0

Deprecate oslo.messaging rpc_backend option parameter

Oslo.messaging uses the transport_url to represent the rpc and
notification messaging driver to use and its full configuration. The
rpc_backend configuration option is deprecated for removal and
should not gate oslo.messaging driver configuration options.

This patch:
* deprecate rpc_backend
* remove conditional check
* update spec tests
* add release note

Change-Id: I0c9bacd06490dfd5810e528f8dd0b630d33954c8
Closes-Bug: #1708976

Add watcher client install support

Change-Id: I24ea46941576c43564554a94ac52fe54979016a9

Add WSGI support for `watcher-api'

Adds support to run watcher-api with mod-wsgi[0].

[0]https://review.openstack.org/#/c/450740/

Change-Id: Ie6bbde98bee19ccc4a938bba28b66b759ccd3307
Implements: blueprint wsgi-support

Deprecate revocation_cache_time option

The revocation_cache_time is deprecated for removel because of PKI
token format is no longer supported.
Update warning message and add a release note.

Change-Id: Ia9fd9b7af4b345715bbe233f9724383817f64686
Closes-Bug: #1717144

Allow setting log files for apache vhost

This allows the setting of the error and access file logs, as well as
the access log format. This was done in a similar fashion as one can
configure these ones in the keystone wsgi manifest.

Change-Id: Ib96107448fa8dde4bae799144d529f85019b1d98

Configure *_domain_name to Default by default

Keystone v2.0 API was removed so we have no choice but configuring
user_domain_name and project_domain_name otherwise it fallbacks to
Keystone v2.0 and it fails. This patch sets the default value so we make
sure Keystone v3 will be used out of the box for our users.

Change-Id: I10ea974343681668c5936d26308506c8a58da17c

add parameter to overwrite/add wsgi process options

Add parameter to apache_wsgi to allow overwrite
and/or add additional wsgi process options.

This possibility was added to openstacklib
with Change-Id: I41914ce3361988d5db1695f09d21209772fdf548
lease enter the commit message for your changes. Lines starting

Change-Id: Ieab1cfea6bbf026b783c701e7631fb38c21061c4

Expose use_json logging option

It enables JSON-formatted logging from oslo.log.

Change-Id: I2933a99745c7cebe02800ea5af77a6e173e3df46

Add group to policy management

The move of policy.json into code means the file may not exist. We've
added support to ensure that the file exists in the openstacklib but we
need to make sure the permissions are right for each service. This adds
the group information to the policies so it works right.

Depends-On: I26e8b1384f4f69712da9d06a4c565dfd1f17c9ed
Change-Id: I3e6853430363c0976a634ca44d0418948d0ded23
Co-Authored-By: Alex Schultz <aschultz@redhat.com>

Add use_journal option for logging configuration

This enables oslo.log to pass logging records to journald.

Change-Id: If0fee161d0225d399a54bf8679de993af0644f96

Drop all qpid related explanations

Qpid was removed in Mitaka from Oslo Messaging, so we
can remove all qpid related explanations.

Change-Id: I538d406f8dacbf2c88b2097631e3d259df4b7005

Add 'openstack-db' tag to db-sync Exec resource

In order to make easy orchestration on all OpenStack db-sync, add this
tag so people can use this tag in composition layer.
A use case it to set some orchestration to make sure MySQL Galera is
ready before running any Exec with this tag.

Change-Id: I41a7eb38176781bffc16c6886a3de9f855036fbc
Closes-Bug: #1755102

Added retries for db_sync

If db sync fails, it is never retried leading to errors. So, this
patch adds retries for db_sync to avoid sync fails.

Change-Id: I784ca2fc0a9a906633ad60d1338c4b4b73c376c7
Closes-Bug: #1628580

Add pool_timeout option

Add pool_timeout option to configure this value for pool_timeout with
SQLAlchemy.

Change-Id: I1246d4d2ff9b71903573bbe028d418c8b74cea7d
Closes-Bug: #1757581

Remove deprecated keystone authtoken revocation_cache_time option

Change-Id: I93b272477a2d0b1ac2caa6e3e5d0d49e724cbd1b

Remove deprecated ensure_package option

Change-Id: I3c5d099bea57fde3816877efdfce9ed69650c964

Deprecate auth_uri option

Option auth_uri from group keystone_authtoken is deprecated[1].
Use option www_authenticate_uri from group keystone_authtoken.

[1]https://review.openstack.org/#/c/508522/

Change-Id: I35fd2cc9b91148ab23793075862483940d92798e
Depends-On: I4c82a63baabd6b9304b302c97cd751a0103d8316
Closes-Bug: #1759098

Debian is using python3-watcherclient

Change-Id: I60c2a73f20bc0ba75c0d90ed8b640e8120949956

Debian path to app.wsgi

Debian isn't using /usr/lib/python2.7. First, its using Python 3,
and second, the app.wsgi is in /usr/share/watcher-common.

Change-Id: Ib93cbb8362625634398b9d92c56b251e96450ed6

neat: missing : in $::os_service_default

Change-Id: I783b2293f5e1f06e670246804fbbb5066a497876

Replace port 35357 with 5000

Now that the v2.0 API has been removed, we don't have a reason to
include deployment instructions for two separate applications on
different ports.

Change-Id: Ic1d30e49dc878f997c4d8e0eb228b2e80da578c0

Remove deprecated rpc_backend param

Remove the deprecated rpc_backend param which has been deprecated for
two years. The default_transport_url has been present for a while
now and should be used.

Change-Id: I0b1356b3e44c3f01fb7025fa8f0720403dd376da

Remove rabbit_max_retries option

The rabbit_max_retries parameter has been deprecated for one year.
We can remove it.

Change-Id: I0ec9f905a2e07bc6fef8cfe5ca64b542c36dc7c0

Fix annotations

Change-Id: I634d9f225ef60d654b7c1602beb05ecd146139c4

Fix the smoke testing link

Change-Id: I7368774a630233e9a1b3eae17a62bea4be700840

Fix the duplicated vars defined

Change-Id: I57511901fc9a2ac48473fd53dfd756868f1ae2c9
Closes-Bug: #1792705
